messages.title: ELECTION BATTLE
messages.content: Labour are refusing to deal with the deficit and will have to borrow £70 billion more. Their plans mean wasting an extra £4bn a year on interest alone.

messages.title: 10 YEARS OF ACTION
messages.content: Greg Mulholland has a range of achievements over the past 10 years and is on course to win.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With just days to go, it’s Greg Mulholland or Labour here. Labour - campaign in disarray and candidate lacking a local record. UKIP - at 501 and 33/1 outsiders. Conservatives - campaign and candidate non-existent, last minute candidate and 331/1 outsiders. Greg's Lib Dems - a real record, a strong candidate. On course to win.

issues.economy: Labour are refusing to give our NHS the extra £8bn a year it needs.
issues.health: Labour are refusing to give our NHS the extra £8bn a year it needs.
